src:
Manchester United Siapkan Tawaran untuk Kai Havertz
06 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Premier League, Manchester United nampaknya benar-benar serius ingin merekrut Kai Havertz. Klub berjuluk Setan Merah itu diyakini bakal segera melepas tawaran untuk pemain Bayer Leverkusen.
Performa Manchester United musim ini memang mendapatkan banyak sorotan. Setan Merah dinilai tidak memiliki kreatifitas yang memadai, sehingga mereka selalu kesulitan menghadapi tim-tim yang bermain bertahan.
Demi mengatasi situasi ini, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer berencana belanja playmaker baru. Pelatih 46 tahun itu ingin mendatangkan pemain yang bisa memberikan perbedaan untuk lini serang mereka.
The Mirror melansir bahwa skuat Setan Merah sudah mengunci target transfer mereka. Setan Merah disebut ingin memboyong Kai Havertz dari Bayer Leverkusen.

Simak rencana transfer MU untuk Havertz di bawah ini.
text:
Manchester United Prepare Bids for Kai Havertz
Nov 6 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Premier League club, Manchester United seems to be really serious about recruiting Kai Havertz. The club nicknamed the Red Devils are believed to be immediately releasing bids for Bayer Leverkusen players.
Manchester United's performance this season did get a lot of attention. The Red Devils are deemed not to have adequate creativity, so they always have a hard time facing teams that play defense.
In order to overcome this situation, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer plans to shop for a new playmaker. The 46-year-old coach wants to bring in players who can make a difference to their attacking lines.
The Mirror reported that the Red Devils squad had locked their transfer target. Red Devils are said to want to bring Kai Havertz from Bayer Leverkusen.

Check out MU's transfer plan for Havertz below.
